welcome.hi: Hi! My name is Lucas Montenegro and I am Junior Web Developer from Argentina. I've been teaching myself programming since 2018 and now I'm looking to get my first job as a software developer.
welcome.thisWebsite: This is my personal website where I host the learning projects I'm working on. Take a look at them in <1>My Projects</1>.

myProjects.title: My Projects
myProjects.description: As of April 2019, these are my most recent web development projects. They are essentially front-end apps built with React and Redux.
